why is hexakill in twisted treeline all the time and not summoners rift?
One more champ to a 5v5 isn't much: top'd just get a support. They'd above to do 10v10, or something.

Bro. Do you really think that non-stop URF would be fun? I can tell you that, for certain, it'd be bad. It's amazing the first day, good the second day, but, by the third day, it's almost boring. After a full week, it'd be more full of salt and toxicity than gold V.
I agree completely
they only plan on releasing it every once and a while so their community will want it more resulting to the day they do release it and everyone will be playing it telling others to play it as well

Can we please just get old Dominion added into the RGMQ? Def Not Dominion quite frankly sucks compared to old Dominion. 

The removal of the bottom towers was the worst possible thing you could have done. Before, if you couldn't hold top, you could contest towers elsewhere. Mobile champs could backdoor towers for their team. Champs that were better 1v1 could go bot.

Now, the mode is just a constant 5v5 at the top point. If you can't hold it, well, prepare to get stomped. There's nothing you can do at that point. At least if bot was opened up, you could use it as a backdoor path for the enemy's tower. But not only was it closed off, but they also gave permanent vision of the only backdoor route.

Essentially what this has come down to is a half circle shaped ARAM map with capture points that just ensure that no comebacks are ever possible.

Thanks Riot.
